Applications for a judicial separation in Ireland are made to the court
Cur síos ar Scaradh Dleathúil agus an córas len é a chur i gcrích
A divorce decree allows both parties to a marriage to remarry
Ceadaíonn foraithne cholscartha don dá pháirtí pósta athphósadh a dhéanamh
Special conditions must be met, however, before a court can grant a divorce
Sular féidir le cúirt colscaradh a dheonú, ní mór coinníollacha speisialta a chomhlíonadh, áfach
A dissolution decree allows both parties to a civil partnership to marry
Tugann foraithne díscaoileadh cead don dá pháirtí i bpáirtnéireacht shibhialta pósadh
Special conditions must be met, however, before a court can grant a dissolution
Caithfear conníollacha speisialta a chomhlíonadh, áfach, sular féidir le cúirt díscaoileadh a bhronnadh
